author: Aaron Back
title: Nothing Is Going Right at Campbell
text:
Campbell Soup Co. on Friday announced the abrupt resignation of its chief executive, alongside a miserable set of quarterly results that showed clearly why she had to go.
Almost everything went wrong for Campbell. Organic net sales, which strip out acquisitions and currency effects, were flat from a year earlier, dragged down by weak performance of soup. Adjusted gross margins fell by four percentage points to 32%, which the company characterized as “below our expectations.” Campbell lowered guidance for operating earnings...
